thread.title: Dutch teacher strips off to lecture class about human body
thread.title_full: Dutch teacher strips off to lecture class about human body - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Dutch teacher strips off to lecture class about human body
text:
Biologie op Groene Hart Rijnwoude is echt supercool!!!
Posted by Groene Hart scholen on Monday, 5 October 2015 That’s one way to guarantee your student’s attention.
A teacher in the Netherlands stripped off in front of her class – in order to teach them all about anatomy.
Debby Heerkens, a science teacher at Groene Hart Rijnwoude School, has gone viral after her eye-catching teaching methods were uploaded by a pupil in her biology.
Heerkens stunned her seventh grade students when she stepped on to a table during her biology class and began taking off her shirt and pants.
But underneath her clothes, she was wearing a skintight suit that had a detailed view of the human body’s muscular system.
Groene Hart Scholen Debby Heerkens, a science teacher at Groene Hart Rijnwoude School, stunned students to teach them about the human body. Groene Hart Scholen Debby Heerkens, a science teacher at Groene Hart Rijnwoude School, stunned students to teach them about the human body. Previous Next Enlarge Heerkens was wearing multiple layers of similar suits, showing off the skeletal structure and also the internal organs.
So far, more than 60,000 people have viewed the video on Facebook .
Supporters have been quick to praise her unique methods on social media, with one writing: “What an inspiring individual! Such a great example.”
Another added: “She’s crazy. She's the coolest teacher!”.
lhanna@nydailynews.com
